articles.title: AirAsia classified as PN17 company after Bursa dismisses its appeal - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR (Jan 13): AirAsia Group Bhd has failed in its bid to secure an extension of the relief period from being classified as a Practice Note 17 (PN17) company.The low-cost carrier is thus deemed a PN17 company now.The group had applied to Bursa Malaysi…

articles.title: Whisky For Visas: India, UK Start Major Trade Talks - NDTV
articles.description: Britain and India began hammering out a post-Brexit trade deal on Thursday, with London seeking a cut in tariffs on Scotch whisky and greater access to the Asian giant's services and tech sectors.
articles.content:
A joint statement reiterated a target of doubling bilateral trade volumes by 2030.
